data.system_settings: iPad only, landscape mode, iOS 10.3.1, Discord 1.8.3
data.actual_result: The hidden parts of the status bar should show in black font color.
data.expected_result: Parts of the status bar do not show as they are the same font color as Discord's light theme
data.short_description: Parts of the status bar do not show in light theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Change Discord to light theme. - Observe the absence of parts of the status bar.
